Our very own Platteview High School Head Cheerleading Coach, Angela AuBuchon, Ph.D., recently had a paper published in a journal called Frontiers for Young Minds. This paper is specifically written for (and edited by) children. It explores how children's brains process background noise and why children have a harder time than adults listening and remembering when there is noise.

Very interesting topic! Take a look here:
https://kids.frontiersin.org/article/10.3389/frym.2020.00104
